name: .22 pistol magazine
description: A flush fitting magazine for use with target pistols, capable of feeding 6 tiny pistol cartridges.

name: .22 high capacity pistol magazine
description: A flush fitting magazine for use with target pistols, capable of feeding 12 tiny pistol cartridges.
A 'speedloader', a metal block capable of holding and releasing ammunition to aid in loading revolvers.  Accepts 8 standard tiny pistol cartridges.
